metro.WindowControls

Class InputField

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
      • metro.WindowControls.InputField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlElement

    public class InputField
extends ActionObservable
implements ControlElement
    Provides an input field control to make user inputs (in form of a string) possible. There are no events triggered after typing something in but the method .getText() return the whole text.
    Author:
    hauke

      • InputField

        public InputField(java.awt.Rectangle position)
        Creates a new InputField with one line to input text. The start-text is "" and the window is null
        Parameters:
        position - The position.

      • InputField

        public InputField(java.awt.Rectangle position,
          Window win)
        Creates a new InputField with one line to input text. The start-text is ""
        Parameters:
        position - The position on the window
        win - The window handle.

      • InputField

        public InputField(java.awt.Rectangle position,
          Window win,
          java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new InputField with one line to input text.
        Parameters:
        position - The position on the window
        win - The window handle.
        text - The text, that's in the input box at the beginning.
